snippet.title: Radioactivity - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
☢️ Radioactivity – Team up with friends as Liquidators! Avoid mutated horrors. Clean up radioactive wasteland. Survive. Have fun.☢️

👉 Wishlist Now
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1595160/Radioactivity

You and your team are Liquidators, people who turned to the zone in search of a better life. You work on behalf of the public, cleaning up the radioactive wasteland left by a devastating meteor impact. Your goal is not only to earn but to survive by gathering food supplies and overcoming the threats lurking in this dangerous world.

#game #coop #horror #survival  #indiegame #proximitychat  #trailer #stalker #radioactivity
